Posts.Content: Apr 9, 2009 05:53AM CKE19 wrote: I had an excision done on 1/29 and my surgeon said that as soon as I could touch the scar to put vitamin E oil on it.  It has worked like a charm.  I'm now using it on my sentinel node biopsy scar.
